NL description: Allow failure simulations between nucleo/jetson and nucleo/nucleo
FRETish: in SimulationMode whenever SimulateFailureTransitions System shall eventually satisfy JetsonFailureTransitionToNucleo | NucleoFailureSwitchActiveNucleo
LTL: (H (((JetsonFailureDetectionRunning & NucleoOneFailureDetectionRunning) & NucleoTwoFailureDetectionRunning) & RaspberryFailureDetectionRunning))

NL description: Be able to predict hardware failures
FRETish: System shall always satisfy JetsonFailureDetectionRunning & ActiveNucleoFailureDetectionRunning & RaspberryFailureDetectionRunning
LTL: (H (((JetsonFailureDetectionRunning & NucleoOneFailureDetectionRunning) & NucleoTwoFailureDetectionRunning) & RaspberryFailureDetectionRunning))

NL description: Simulate Packet Loss
FRETish: in SimulationMode whenever SimulatePacketLoss System shall always satisfy PacketLossRate <= AcceptablePacketLoss
LTL: ((H (((! SimulationMode) & (Y SimulationMode)) -> (Y ((((! SimulatePacketLoss) S ((! SimulatePacketLoss) & (SimulationMode & (Z (! SimulationMode))))) | (PacketLossRate <= AcceptablePacketLoss)) S ((((! SimulatePacketLoss) S ((! SimulatePacketLoss) & (SimulationMode & (Z (! SimulationMode))))) | (PacketLossRate <= AcceptablePacketLoss)) & (SimulationMode & (Z (! SimulationMode)))))))) & (((! ((! SimulationMode) & (Y SimulationMode))) S ((! ((! SimulationMode) & (Y SimulationMode))) & (SimulationMode & (Z (! SimulationMode))))) -> ((((! SimulatePacketLoss) S ((! SimulatePacketLoss) & (SimulationMode & (Z (! SimulationMode))))) | (PacketLossRate <= AcceptablePacketLoss)) S ((((! SimulatePacketLoss) S ((! SimulatePacketLoss) & (SimulationMode & (Z (! SimulationMode))))) | (PacketLossRate <= AcceptablePacketLoss)) & (SimulationMode & (Z (! SimulationMode)))))))

NL description: Show which nucleo is under control;
FRETish: upon ControlLoopStartRaspberry shall before ControlLoopFinish satisfy (NucleoOneControl => SendNucleoOneControlMessage) & (NucleoTwoControl => SendNucleoTwoControlMessage)
LTL: (H (ControlLoopFinish -> ((H (! ControlLoopStart)) | (((Y TRUE) & (! (ControlLoopStart & (Z (! ControlLoopStart))))) & (Y (! ((! ((NucleoOneControl -> SendNucleoOneControlMessage) & (NucleoTwoControl -> SendNucleoTwoControlMessage))) S ((! ((NucleoOneControl -> SendNucleoOneControlMessage) & (NucleoTwoControl -> SendNucleoTwoControlMessage))) & (ControlLoopStart & (Z (! ControlLoopStart)))))))))))

NL description: Health monitoring of electric embedded systems
FRETish: System shall always satisfy ElectricSystemsHealthMonitoring
LTL: (H ElectricSystemsHealthMonitoring)

NL description: Servo, Battery and Attitude simulations and monitoring
FRETish: while SimulationMode | RealMode ActiveNucleo shall always satisfy ServoMonitoring & BatteryMonitoring & AttitudeMonitoring
LTL: (H ((SimulationMode | RealMode) -> ((ServoMonitoring & BatteryMonitoring) & AttitudeMonitoring)))

NL description: Determination of the overall health of the system
FRETish: System shall always satisfy OverallSystemHealthMonitoring
LTL: (O OverallSystemHealthMonitoring)

SimulationMode) & (Y SimulationMode)) & (Y (H (! ((! SimulationMode) & (Y SimulationMode)))))))) -> (O[0,9] (((! SimulationMode) & (Y SimulationMode)) & (Y (H (! ((! SimulationMode) & (Y SimulationMode)))))))) -> (O[0,9] (((! SimulationMode) & (Y SimulationMode)) & (Y (H (! ((! SimulationMode) & (Y SimulationMode)))))))) & (((! SimulationMode) & (Y SimulationMode)) & (Y (H (! ((! SimulationMode) & (Y SimulationMode)))))))))

EvaluateControllerPerformance) & (SimulationDataSaved & ((Y (! SimulationDataSaved)) | (((! SimulationMode) & (Y SimulationMode)) & (Y (H (! ((! SimulationMode) & (Y SimulationMode)))))))))))))

NL description: Provide power consumption data
FRETish: ActiveNucleo shall always satisfy MonitorPowerConsumption & ReturnPowerConsumptionData
LTL: (H (MonitorPowerConsumption & ReturnPowerConsumptionData))

NL description: Simulation of communications and package sending
FRETish: in SimulationModeRaspberry shall always satisfy SimulateCommunications & SimulatePackageSending
LTL: (H (SimulationMode -> (SimulateCommunications & SimulatePackageSending)))

NL description: During HIL simulations the Gazebo should run using real-time clock
FRETish: during HILSimulationGazebo shall always satisfy UseRealTimeClock
LTL: (H (HILSimulation -> UseRealTimeClock))

NL description: Run each simulation loop within 10ms

LTL: ((H (((! SimulationMode) & (Y SimulationMode)) -> (Y (((O[10,10] ((SimulationLoopStart & ((Y (! SimulationLoopStart)) | (SimulationMode & (Z (! SimulationMode))))) & (! SimulationLoopFinish))) -> (O[0,9] ((SimulationMode & (Z (! SimulationMode))) | SimulationLoopFinish))) S (((O[10,10] ((SimulationLoopStart & ((Y (! SimulationLoopStart)) | (SimulationMode & (Z (! SimulationMode))))) & (! SimulationLoopFinish))) -> (O[0,9] ((SimulationMode & (Z (! SimulationMode))) | SimulationLoopFinish))) & (SimulationMode & (Z (! SimulationMode)))))))) & (((! ((! SimulationMode) & (Y SimulationMode))) S ((! ((! SimulationMode) & (Y SimulationMode))) & (SimulationMode & (Z (! SimulationMode))))) -> (((O[10,10] ((SimulationLoopStart & ((Y (! SimulationLoopStart)) | (SimulationMode & (Z (! SimulationMode))))) & (! SimulationLoopFinish))) -> (O[0,9] ((SimulationMode & (Z (! SimulationMode))) | SimulationLoopFinish))) S (((O[10,10] ((SimulationLoopStart & ((Y (! SimulationLoopStart)) | (SimulationMode & (Z (! SimulationMode))))) & (! SimulationLoopFinish))) -> (O[0,9] ((SimulationMode & (Z (! SimulationMode))) | SimulationLoopFinish))) & (SimulationMode & (Z (! SimulationMode)))))))

NL description: Assess the hardware time performance
FRETish: when ControlLoopFinish System shall satisfy CollectHardwareExecutionTimes & AssessHardwareTimePerformance
LTL: ((H (! ControlLoopFinish)) | (! ((! (CollectHardwareExecutionTimes & AssessHardwareTimePerformance)) S ((! (CollectHardwareExecutionTimes & AssessHardwareTimePerformance)) & (ControlLoopFinish & (Z (! ControlLoopFinish)))))))

NL description: The control loop will complete within 12 milliseconds (was: Present the total time spent)
FRETish: upon ControlLoopStart System shall within 12 milliseconds satisfy ControlLoopFinish
LTL: (H ((O[12,12] ((ControlLoopStart & (Z (! ControlLoopStart))) & (! ControlLoopFinish))) -> (O[0,11] ((! (Y TRUE)) | ControlLoopFinish))))

NL description: The control algorithm will complete within 6 milliseconds (was: Present the time spent in the control algorithm)
FRETish: upon ControlAlgorithmStart System shall within 6 milliseconds satisfy ControlAlgorithmFinish
LTL: (H ((O[6,6] ((ControlAlgorithmStart & (Z (! ControlAlgorithmStart))) & (! ControlAlgorithmFinish))) -> (O[0,5] ((! (Y TRUE)) | ControlAlgorithmFinish))))
